page.title: 04Great Hollanden Farm.
page.content: At Great Hollanden Farm,near Hildenbourgh, Mr Brooks grows some soft fruits such as strawberries, raspberries and currants which farmers nearby cannot grow.These crops can grow at Great Hollanden because the soil is good fertile silt brought down by streams from the higher land 10,000 years ago. People can visit the farm to pick these fruits,it is a Pick_Your_Own farm.They store the fruit in their freezers at home. Mr.Brooks also sends soft fruit to London,Paris and the south of France when the season there has ended. Wheat from the farm is sent to Tilbury and some is exported to Germany,Africa and France. Marina
